subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets outfielder Endy Chávez injured his right hamstring and right ankle while playing winter ball in Venezuela. A Mets spokesman said Sunday that Chávez was hurt last month while playing for Magallanes. Chávez is expected to be ready for spring training next month, the spokesman said.
